email_chain.subject: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

I hope this message finds you well. We have a vessel available for a coal shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai. The vessel, MV OCEAN STAR, has a cargo capacity of 75,000MT. We are offering a freight rate of $25/MT on CIF terms.

Please let me know if you are interested and if you need any further details.

Best regards,
Emily Carter
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Thank you for the offer. The rate seems reasonable, but we are looking for a slightly lower rate given the current market conditions. Could you provide more details on the vessel's DWT and LOA? Also, what is the laycan for this shipment?

Best regards,
John Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

The MV OCEAN STAR has a DWT of 82,000 and an LOA of 225 meters. The laycan is flexible, but we are targeting a loading window starting around 2023-10-20.

Regarding the rate, we can consider lowering it to $23.50/MT if we can finalize the deal soon.

Best regards,
Emily Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Emily,

Thank you for the revised rate. We are interested in proceeding. Could you confirm the laycan and provide the demurrage rate?

Best regards,
John Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

The laycan is confirmed as 2023-10-20 to 2023-10-25. The demurrage rate is $20,000 per day.

Please let me know if you need any further details to proceed.

Best regards,
Emily Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Emily,

Everything looks good. We are ready to proceed with the shipment. Please confirm the final details.

Best regards,
John Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Great to hear that! We will confirm the laycan as 2023-10-20 to 2023-10-25 and ensure that the stem is ready by then.

Looking forward to a successful shipment.

Best regards,
Emily Carter
